title: Asking Riot to lower my MMR so I can be back in bronze again
body: Silver 5 is not fun. Every game I've won is because the enemy team decided to throw and every game I lost is because my team did. It's impossible to climb consistently unless you play some broken cheese champion like Pantheon, Fizz, Jax, Darius or Fiora and if you don't you're at an inherent disadvantage. I don't know if Bronze was like this but from personal experience, it wasn't. You could play any champion, even those that were off - meta and still win. If all else fails, I will have to resort to "throwing" games myself to go back to where I started.
